attributes.name: model-value
attributes.desc: visibility of Dialog

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: visibility of Dialog

attributes.name: title
attributes.desc: title of Dialog. Can also be passed with a named slot (see the following table)

attributes.name: width
attributes.desc: width of Dialog, default is 50%

attributes.name: fullscreen
attributes.desc: whether the Dialog takes up full screen

attributes.name: top
attributes.desc: value for margin-top of Dialog CSS, default is 15vh

attributes.name: modal
attributes.desc: whether a mask is displayed

attributes.name: modal-class
attributes.desc: custom class names for mask

attributes.name: header-class ^(2.9.3)
attributes.desc: custom class names for header wrapper

attributes.name: body-class ^(2.9.3)
attributes.desc: custom class names for body wrapper

attributes.name: footer-class ^(2.9.3)
attributes.desc: custom class names for footer wrapper

attributes.name: append-to-body
attributes.desc: whether to append Dialog itself to body. A nested Dialog should have this attribute set to true

attributes.name: append-to ^(2.4.3)
attributes.desc: which element the Dialog appends to. Will override append-to-body

attributes.name: lock-scroll
attributes.desc: whether scroll of body is disabled while Dialog is displayed

attributes.name: open-delay
attributes.desc: the Time(milliseconds) before open

attributes.name: close-delay
attributes.desc: the Time(milliseconds) before close

attributes.name: close-on-click-modal
attributes.desc: whether the Dialog can be closed by clicking the mask

attributes.name: close-on-press-escape
attributes.desc: whether the Dialog can be closed by pressing ESC

attributes.name: show-close
attributes.desc: whether to show a close button

attributes.name: before-close
attributes.desc: callback before Dialog closes, and it will prevent Dialog from closing, use done to close the dialog

attributes.name: draggable
attributes.desc: enable dragging feature for Dialog

attributes.name: overflow ^(2.5.4)
attributes.desc: draggable Dialog can overflow the viewport

attributes.name: center
attributes.desc: whether to align the header and footer in center

attributes.name: align-center ^(2.2.16)
attributes.desc: whether to align the dialog both horizontally and vertically

attributes.name: destroy-on-close
attributes.desc: destroy elements in Dialog when closed

attributes.name: close-icon
attributes.desc: custom close icon, default is Close

attributes.name: z-index
attributes.desc: same as z-index in native CSS, z-order of dialog

attributes.name: header-aria-level ^(a11y)
attributes.desc: header's aria-level attribute

attributes.name: custom-class ^(deprecated)
attributes.desc: custom class names for Dialog

slots.name: header
slots.desc: content of the Dialog header; Replacing this removes the title, but does not remove the close button.

slots.name: title ^(deprecated)
slots.desc: works the same as the header slot. Use that instead.

events.name: @opened
events.desc: triggers when the Dialog opening animation ends

events.name: @closed
events.desc: triggers when the Dialog closing animation ends

events.name: @open-auto-focus
events.desc: triggers after Dialog opens and content focused

events.name: @close-auto-focus
events.desc: triggers after Dialog closed and content focused
